Field Detail

RECOMMENDED_WIDTH

public static final int RECOMMENDED_WIDTH
Minimum layout width that should be used in panels set with the Layout generated by getStandardLayout().
User can nevertheless use greater values. Smaller values are not recommended.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

MINIMUM_WIDTH

public static final int MINIMUM_WIDTH
Minimum width for panels & windows that contain a FormLayout with the default configuration

See Also:
Constant Field Values

FIELD_WIDTH

public static final int FIELD_WIDTH
Field width.

See Also:

Method Detail

addFieldContainerSkeleton

public com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.widget.LayoutContainer[] addFieldContainerSkeleton(com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.widget.LayoutContainer parent)
Adds a horizontal panel to the passed parent with:
  1. a panel with FormLayout to the left, for fields;
  2. a panel to the right, for icons.
The horizontal panel has a 10 px margin bottom.

Parameters:
parent - parent container for the added elements
Returns:
left container at index 0 and right container at index 1.

addFieldContainerSkeleton

public com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.widget.LayoutContainer[] addFieldContainerSkeleton(com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.widget.LayoutContainer parent,
                                                                                  int fieldWidth)
Adds a horizontal panel to the passed parent with:
  1. a panel with FormLayout to the left, for fields;
  2. a panel to the right, for icons.
The horizontal panel has a 10 px margin bottom.

Parameters:
parent - parent container for the added elements
fieldWidth - the width in pixels for the field.
Returns:
left container at index 0 and right container at index 1.

addFieldContainerSkeleton

public com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.widget.LayoutContainer[] addFieldContainerSkeleton(com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.widget.LayoutContainer parent,
                                                                                  boolean withMarginBottom)
Same behaviour as addFieldContainerSkeleton(LayoutContainer, boolean, int), taking the default recommended width for fields.

Parameters:
parent -
withMarginBottom -
Returns:

addFieldContainerSkeleton

public com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.widget.LayoutContainer[] addFieldContainerSkeleton(com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.widget.LayoutContainer parent,
                                                                                  boolean withMarginBottom,
                                                                                  int fieldWidth)
Adds an horizontal panel to the passed parent with:
  1. a panel with FormLayout to the left, for fields;
  2. a panel to the right, for icons.

Parameters:
parent -
withMarginBottom - if true, adds a 10px margin bottom to the horizontal panel.
Returns:
array with left container at index 0 and right container at index 1.

getStandardLayout

public com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.widget.layout.FormLayout getStandardLayout()
Returns a standard FormLayout. Does not change the default 10px padding.
The field width is set as the default Constants.FIELD_WIDTH

Returns:

getStandardLayout

public com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.widget.layout.FormLayout getStandardLayout(boolean addMarginBottom)
Returns a standard FormLayout.

Parameters:
addMarginBottom -
Returns:
the created layout.

getStandardLayout

public com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.widget.layout.FormLayout getStandardLayout(int fieldWidth)
Same as getStandardLayout(), but permits specifying a width for the fields.

Parameters:
fieldWidth - width in pixels for the form fields.
Returns:

getStandardLayout

public com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.widget.layout.FormLayout getStandardLayout(boolean addMarginBottom,
                                                                          int fieldWidth)
Returns a standard FormLayout. Does not change the default 10px padding.

Parameters:
addMarginBottom - if true, adds a 10px margin on the bottom of the layout.
fieldWidth - width in pixels for the form fields.
Returns:
created layout.

addIcon

public void addIcon(String title,
                    com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.widget.LayoutContainer iconContainer,
                    String fileName)
Adds an icon to the passed panel. The icon must be under 'img' directory.

Parameters:
title - icon title
iconContainer - container for the icon
fileName - icon graphic resource name.
